How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

Utilizing the Customer Service Case and Knowledge to ensure the food gets the right location at the right time.

ServiceNow customer service management and its suite of applications will provide a centralized location to handle inquiry and complaints promptly. Surveys and assessments will be utilized to capture sentiment and feedback.
Different case types can be uncovered from reports and performance analytics, and Issue Auto Resolution IAR as well as the need to deploy the Conversational chat to meet constituents 24/7.

Field Service Management Dispatch will provide a command center to get the right pickup tasks to the drivers to ensure none of the food gets left behind to waste.
